data.text: @danikaplowman Omfg, this is insane. I’m at a loss for words.
@nt195c @danikaplowman Thanks for sharing. Vote: locked. Unless Chloe Swarbrick throws her hat in the ring, which I'm not really predicting will happen for at least another 4-5 years.
@SueBoyde @danikaplowman Most likely, or someone sympathetic to him.
@jacobjakemo @danikaplowman Fortunately Collins has owned up to it and apologised. https://t.co/CFR0VKTsFh
@danikaplowman This is what you call.. politics..
@danikaplowman Just when I thought they scraped the bottom of the barrel with their gross Tiki bar they stoop even lower 😌
@danikaplowman Oh God no.. Why him? Geez  o r ok we can do better surely.. Not Leo

he has knowingly flouted covid restrictions, he has hosted events for right wing political parties, he has made minority communities the butt of his jokes before and I’m certain he’ll do it again. he should not be given any sort of political platform.

this is getting more attention than I expected so let me just say that this comment isn’t the only reason this man should repulse you, and the idea of him as mayor should terrify you. I know multiple women who have met Leo and been inappropriately, unashamedly sexualised by him-
